Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Oil consumption rate increase. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Engine Control component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Issue technical bulletin to all operators
d) Attributable Code: F - Failure/ageing/Corrosion/Material Failure
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
Date: 26/04/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao
